subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Dion Lewis rushed for 159 yards and a touchdown and Dan Hutchins kicked a 33-yard field goal with 52 seconds left as Pittsburgh beat North Carolina in the Meineke Car Care Bowl.
snippet: Dion Lewis rushed for 159 yards and a touchdown and Dan Hutchins kicked a 33-yard field goal with 52 seconds left as Pittsburgh beat North Carolina in the Meineke Car Care Bowl.
